data.name: ServiceSphere
data.description: I developed a scalable e-commerce platform using Spring Boot and Spring Cloud in a microservices architecture. The application features service discovery with Eureka, centralized configuration management with Spring Cloud Config, and request routing through Spring Cloud Gateway. Authentication authorization are secured with Keycloak, ensuring a robust and modular online marketplace.

data.name: Authentication Microservice
data.description: I implemented a refresh token rotation authentication system with hacker detection for improved security using Django Rest Framework, MySQL, and Django Simple JWT. This facilitated coupled authentication with other applications, enabling secure integration via redirect URIs and URL parameters.

data.name: Authenticated Blogs Application
data.description: I developed a secure blog management application leveraging Spring Boot, Spring Security, and MySQL. Featuring user authentication, CRUD operations, and a responsive UI, it ensures a seamless blogging experience while prioritizing security with Spring Security.

data.name: GlowBeyond E-commerce Platform
data.description: I built a robust e-commerce platform, GlowBeyond, using Vue.js for the frontend and Django Rest Framework for the backend. This platform integrates secure login and JWT token authentication, showcasing the latest products with add-to-cart functionality, cart management, and notifications.

data.name: EzBdrige
data.description: EzBridge revolutionizes marketing by effortlessly bridging the gap between businesses and social media influencers.

data.name: Orderlab
data.description: From coffee beans and paper clips to the manufacturing supply chain of space shuttles, ORDERLAB takes care of your B2B ordering workflows, so you can focus on the success of your core business.

data.name: rCBT
data.description: The Absolute Solution For Fair Online Examination
